Rule.Name: MethodsWithAsyncModifierMustEndWithAsync
Rule.Context: Methods with async modifier (p.Ex. public async Task DoStuffAsync()) must end with Async.
Rule.Description: Fires when an async method is named Foo() instead of FooAsync().

Rule.Name: MethodEndingWithAsyncMustHaveAsyncModifier
Rule.Context: Methods whose name end with an Async suffix must use the async modifier (p.Ex. public async Task ExecuteAsync()).
Rule.Description: Fires when a method is named FooAsync() but is missing the async modifier.

Rule.Name: MethodsWithAsyncModifierShouldReturnAwaitable
Rule.Context: Methods with async modifier which return void are "fire and forget". They can't be synchronized and exceptions are lost.
Rule.Description: Fires when a method with async modifier is returning void.
